subject: Skiing
Avalanches
World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
Deaths (Fatalities)
organizations: United States Ski and Snowboard Assn
lead_paragraph: Ronnie Berlack, 20, and Bryce Astle, 19, prospects from the American team, were killed near their European training base in the Alps.
snippet: Ronnie Berlack, 20, and Bryce Astle, 19, prospects from the American team, were killed near their European training base in the Alps.
